description: French bistro & industrial seating are an ideal choice for busy cafes, as they are light, easy to move around and elegantly designed.  We supply a wide range of café furniture and French Bistro side chairs in a variety of styles. Our French Bistro chairs are beautifully crafted and as they can be powder coated to any colour you require, providing a real sense of style to commercial interiors. We can also supply optional seat pads for our French bistro seating range to perfectly complement cafe interiors and exteriors. All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
name: French Bistro & Industrial Seating
